entry.title: Hi-Chew Tropical Fruit Chews Candy - 6 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Morinaga & Company
Type: Candy
Price: 16.50

Hi Chew-The Famous Fruity Chewy Candies

ALL NEW TROPICAL MIX BAG-KIWI, PINEAPPLE AND MANGO

The ALL NEW Tropical Mix bag includes Kiwi, Pineapple, and Mango flavors. Take your tastebuds on a vacation! *Bags are filled by weight not by product or flavor. There are approximately 20 pieces in this bag.

 

100 g Bags | 6 CT BOX

Fresh Japanese Candy Shipped Fast at Wholesale Prices!

INGREDIENTS: GLUCOSE SYRUP, SUGAR, VEGETABLE OIL (HYDROGENATED PALM KERNEL OIL, PALM KERNEL OIL), LESS THAN 2% OF GELATIN, MALIC ACID, NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVORS, CITRIC ACID, MANGO PUREE, CHIA SEEDS, KIWI FRUIT JUICE POWDER, PINEAPPLE JUICE CONCENTRATE, SUCROSE FATTY ACID ESTERS, SORBITAN MONOSTEARATE, FRUIT JUICE CONCENTRATE (COLOR), VEGETABLE JUICE CONCENTRATE (COLOR), HONEY, ASCORBIC ACID (VITAMIN C), BETA-CAROTENE (COLOR), SOY LECITHIN. CONTAINS SOYBEANS.

MADE IN A FACILITY THAT ALSO PROCESSES MILK.

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labelling or contact manufacturer directly for current data.

Vendor: Morinaga & Company
Type: Candy
Price: 16.50

Hi Chew-The Famous Fruity Chewy Candies

Give your customers the ultimate in chewiness with this delicious Japanese Candy! Hi-Chew Candy is normally famous for its superb fruity flavour, but this Hi-Chew Candy comes complete with the amazing taste of soda pop!
Coming in the flavours of Ramune, which is a sparkling soda along with the classic flavour of cola makes this candy simply incredible!
Quench those tastebuds with the refreshingly awesome taste of the Hi-Chew Soda Pop Candy!
 

 80 g Bags | 6 CT BOX

Fresh Japanese Candy Shipped Fast at Wholesale Prices!

entry.title: Hi-Chew Green Apple Fruit Chews - 15 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Morinaga & Company
Type: Candy
Price: 19.25

Hi-Chew-The Famous Fruity Chewy Candy

Give your customers the ultimate in chewiness with the Hi-Chew Green Apple Fruit Chews! Bursting with that sweet and tart intense, green apple flavour. Hi-Chew candies are among the most flavorful of candies! They are always ultimately chewy, smooth and soft. We say a Green Apple Hi-Chew candy a day will keep the doctor away!  So go ahead and indulge yourself with the incredibly delicious Hi-Chew Fruit Chews!

1.76 oz. Bars | 15 CT BOX

Ingredients: Glucose syrup, sugar, hydrogenated palm kernel oil, gelatin, apple concentrated juice, DL-malic acid, citric acid, natural and artificial flavours, emulsifiers (sucrose fatty acid esters, sorbitan monostearate). Made in a facility that also processes milk and soybeans.

Fresh Japanese Candy Shipped Fast at Wholesale Prices!
